Reviews.Title: no sim card slot for the phone
Reviews.Author: Allan
Reviews.Content: I saw the phone categorized under unlocked phones but it has no slot for sim card for the phone I bought

Reviews.Title: I was skeptical, but overall... good purchase
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: I was pretty skeptical from buying this phoneonline on Amazon, however... I'm glad I bought it because now I'm using it like crazy. There are only about 2 cons.1- no micro usb card. You'll have to buy your own.2- There's something wrong with my text messages. When people text me, it says that they sent it february 17th 2047 at 8:01pm. Weird. I'm going to get that checked out soon. I think it can be fixed.Overall, good phone for the price. It's no Iphone, but I'll get used to it. I like it so far.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: i love the phone.. will order again when i need another one.. thank you..love the camera on the phone.. it takes great pictures..

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: carlos velasquez
Reviews.Content: el producto es de alta calidad lo recomiendo a todas aquellas personas que quieran producto de calidad, lo recomiendo calidad

Reviews.Title: Once you go "Black" you will never go back to anything else
Reviews.Author: Stacy Chandler
Reviews.Content: This is my third Blackberry.  I have tried others each time my carrier extends me an upgrade, but I find that they are not user friendly.  The Curve and the Touch make is so user friendly that I can complete any task seamlessly between applications. This is a straightforward working girl's phone.  I feel like a professional adult handling my busy when using this phone.  It's a must have.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Phone but I'll keep it
Reviews.Author: Dwight Williams
Reviews.Content: I dd not know this phone couldn't work in the British Virgin Islands.There needs to be proper information about the phones. Actually I was searching for the information about the phone but didn't see any, but it's looking very good but it can't use sim card.

Reviews.Title: Its a winner!
Reviews.Author: Step
Reviews.Content: Its the best and most convienent phone I've ever owned. This is my second one like this and its just great, looking foward to the Q10 BlackBerry!!! So. :). All smiles........

Reviews.Title: no sim card slot
Reviews.Author: Damian Silas Joseph
Reviews.Content: I do not see no sim card slot. that phone useless. I cannot put my sim card in it. How the hell do i connect my phone to my locak service provider? waste of money. am shipping that back.

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Shontell
Reviews.Content: My expectation where not set very high, so  I  must say I was pleased with phone. The only thing i did not appreciate is that the charger only worked  for one day. It's buyer beware ,so I probaly will buy another device from this person in the future.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 9350 Spring CDMA Phone
Reviews.Author: Gloria Clemons
Reviews.Content: Product functions well.  Using as a replacement for my previous phone until my contract is up.Good Value.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: does not work in my country cause it doesnt have sim card slot
Reviews.Author: Claudia G.
Reviews.Content: this blackberry cannot work in my country because it doesnt have sim card slot... so I need to send it back- Please let me know how is the way to doi it! I saw the phone categorized under unlocked phones and some time ago i got another BB by Amazon and I have no problem so i didnt realize this point...  the seller didn't notified this to the buyers, i would like to have the opportunity to exchange it

Reviews.Title: The blackberry cannot work in my country so I need to send it back. I need an android phone instead.
Reviews.Author: malaine dublin
Reviews.Content: the blackberry cannot work in my country so I need to send it back. In my country we use android phone instead. Please send me one instead.

Reviews.Title: The phone was return because is not using SIM CARD.
Reviews.Author: Adepelumi Akingunsoye
Reviews.Content: The phone was good but i returned it because the phone is not using SIM CARD and don't know if my money has been refund.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, great price.
Reviews.Author: Mar
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my granddaughter who uses it mainly for communications rather than research. I has a great camera and all the features she uses most. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Not compatible with the Sprint network
Reviews.Author: L. Brooks "L B"
Reviews.Content: I had to return this phone because it was not compatible with the Sprint network even though the phone is labeled as being a Sprint phone.

Reviews.Title: Good out-of-fashion phone.
Reviews.Author: Lyla_yueting
Reviews.Content: Appears brand new with all kinds of covers. Good camera. No touch screen but keyboard fells good. The only thing bothers me is that it's way too slow when updating or installing apps.

Reviews.Title: This celular cant be use with sim card
Reviews.Author: Alfonso
Reviews.Content: This celular cant be use with sim card, and the seller didn't notified this to the buyers, i would like to have the opportunity to exchange it for the other one
